name: Tower Knight
description: Tower Knight is a deck-building tower defense roguelike. Play your cards well, build your deck wisely, and move your knight to strategic points to survive enemy waves. Will you be able to build a deck that conquers this enchanted land?

name: Fairy Biography 6: Revenge
description: In the game, players need to use mouse clicks to control gunpowder props, and through careful aiming and calculation, continuously fire cannons to clear all the treasure boxes in front of them!

name: The Crush House
description: Film and produce 1999's hottest reality TV show: The Crush House! Select a crush-worthy cast, satisfy voracious audiences and keep the show on air to uncover the sinister secrets behind this darkly comic thirst-person shooter.

name: I'm Not Sleepy
description: In this fast-paced arena roguelike, you're a clown, a baker, a robot, a ballerina... or maybe you're just asleep! Battle hordes of bizarre baddies, collect curious items, and select powerful upgrades to enhance the unique abilities of your growing roster of playable characters.

name: PostLife
description: A surreal Exploration-based RPG all about experiencing a comical, yet bizarre mansion! Follow Wade, your typical teenage cat thing who only enjoys two things. Silence and getting high!

description: This is a machine girl themed air combat action role-playing game. In the world of Nornium, you can experience ARPG cosmic air combat and its Rougelike variants, manipulate the "Time Tree" to jump around in parallel time and space at will, or enjoy a leisurely slow life in the presidential suite.

name: Demoniac TV
description: Destroy demoniac TVs with crazy powerups! Demoniac TV is a roguelite with a cyberpunk look that has its game flow in waves. Kill, buy weapons and become stronger! In this mission, exorcising is your final destination.

name: Brisk Up
description: Feeling Low....?? Getting bored....??? Need a refresher....???? BRISK UP with our game by destroying all the boxes before they disappear. Escape your sleepy environment and let it all out. Ascend into the game, conquer the hell itself, destroy everything, until you feel BRISK UP again.

description: Last Respects is a short, single player indie horror game where the player must solve an unexplained murder case and banish a demonic presence.

description: Cute Suika - Big Watermelon is an adorable and fun game about dropping "fruits" into a container, with a little twist. New features and different game modes. Combine small "fruits" together to make them larger, creating big "watermelons" without overflowing the container, and enjoy the challenge.

name: MAOUISHO:~ La Dolce Vita with Another World's Demon Lord~
description: One day, you encounter a wounded woman, unable to communicate verbally and emitting an aura of suspicion. Despite the mysterious circumstances, and burdened by the physical and mental toll of a harsh corporate environment, you decide to welcome her into your life.

name: Yuan Ka Card 2: MetaCard2
description: Hello everyone, this is my second game "Yuan Ka Card 2". Based on the rich card entries of the first generation, it innovatively incorporates the concept of projectiles. Through the strategic combination of cards and projectile targeting, the control of movement is replaced.

name: Undercroft Warriors
description: Crush the forces of hell and get a high score in this addictive, action-packed, arcade-inspired twin-stick shooter!

name: Train Valley World
description: Train Valley World is a transport simulation game about building and managing efficient railway networks. Lay tracks, dispatch trains and deliver goods across the globe to solve intricate logistics puzzles with limited resources. Become a master tycoon - solo or in multiplayer!

name: Lambda Spellcrafting Academy
description: Develop magical programming abilities while building spells. Lambda Spellcrafting Academy is a card-based puzzle game where you build spells (programs) to solve puzzles. Fun for complete beginners or professional wizards.

name: Ferromon Together
description: Journey with your friends in the free to play world of Ferromon Together and take on the 10 towers with over 140 Ferromon to save the world's inhabitants from the Tainted!

name: Ratten Reich
description: Ratten Reich is a grim and unforgiving world, where war has continued for many years. The war is fought between rats, mice, roaches and lizards alike. Slum like cities, burnt corpses, steam tanks, soldiers in imperial uniforms and armor.

name: Burn
description: Burn is a single-player interactive story told over 16 endings. It follows the biggest pop star in the world at the turning point of her career. Will she change pop music? Start a cult? You decide... You will BURN.

name: Skillsworn
description: Skillsworn is a real time, party-based isometric adventure game. Take on the role of a fresh adventurer and embark on a journey through the wilds of the world. Defeat a variety of dangerous foes and prove that you are not just another bored peasant seeking a thrill.

Take on the role of the ultimate Big Boss Bad Guy, building traps and defenses for your sinister lair to thwart the relentless onslaught of pesky heroes.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Brawler - Impy
description: A devilish little imp with a knack for killing. Don't let the tail fool you, Impy is light on his feet and ready to strike fear into the hearts of those frightful human snacks. Impy is a special character skin for the Brawler Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

description: Refreshingly adult Otome, centered around a local flower shop, it is a mature exploration of relationships, and the highs and lows romance. With twelve endings to enjoy, it is sure to make both your heart melt and your pulse race.

description: Space Surveyor is an arcade-style UFO surveying and landing game. Your objective is to collect coins, avoid enemies, and land in a designated landing spot. Master the UFO controls and rack up these high scores!

description: Ciggy World is a clicker game where you click on a cigarette to earn rewards! In Ciggy World, every click brings you closer to a treasure trove of drops, or butts.

Players take on the role of a protagonist trapped on the 6,000-ton ship 'SENARA,' which is sinking due to mysterious phenomena. Experience the desperate escape process in this hyper-realistic real-life 6,000-ton ship 'SENARA,' and immerse yourself in a hauntingly realistic atmosphere of mystery and horror.

Match the falling balls with the same color to make them disappear.
Balls near the disappeared ball will be surprised and stretch left and right, creating an unexpected chain reaction.

name: Five Years Old Memories
description: This is an interactive omnibus animation based on interviews with my friends about their memories around the age of five, based on their personal sensory memories and episodes.

name: No Rest for the Living
description: A remastered version of the No Rest for the Living made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Sigil
description:
Created by id Software co-founder, John Romero, and released as an episode-sized mod consisting of 18 new maps, Sigil fits in between the timelines of Doom (1993) and Doom II. Baphomet, the gatekeeper of Hell, “glitched the final teleporter with his hidden sigil, whose eldritch power brings you to even darker shores of Hell. You fight through this stygian pocket of evil to confront the ultimate harbingers of Satan, then finally return to become Earth’s savior.”

A remastered version made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Master Levels for Doom II
description: A remastered version of the Master Levels for Doom II made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: The Plutonia Experiment
description:
Every effort has been made by the nation's top scientists to close the seven interdimensional Gates of Hell, but one portal remains open. Alone, you must infiltrate the ravaged base, defeat the demon Gatekeeper, and seal the last Hell portal before the undead take over the world.

A remaster of The Plutonia Experiment made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: TNT: Evilution
description:
The UAC relocated their experiments to one of the moons of Jupiter. A spaceship, mistaken for a supply vessel, was granted access. But when it got close to the base, demons poured out. All your comrades were slaughtered or zombified. This time it's not about survival. It's about revenge.

A remaster of TNT: Evilution made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Doom II
description:
Hell has invaded Earth, and to save it, you must battle mightier demons with even more powerful weapons. This beloved sequel to the groundbreaking Doom (1993) introduced players to the brutal Super Shotgun, the infamous Icon of Sin boss, and more intense FPS action.

A remaster of Doom II made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult (which includes new recordings), Improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Doom
description:
The demons came and the marines died...except one. You are the last defense against Hell. Prepare for the most intense battle you’ve ever faced. Experience the complete, original version of the game released in 1993, now with all official content and Episode IV: Thy Flesh Consumed.

A remaster of Doom made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, Improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Doom + Doom II
description: Developed by id Software, and originally released in 1993, DOOM pioneered and popularized the first-person shooter, setting a standard for all FPS games. The critically acclaimed sequel, DOOM II, followed in 1994. Now the definitive, newly enhanced versions of DOOM + DOOM II are available as a combined product.

name: Legacy of Rust
description: Created in collaboration by id Software, Nightdive Studios, and MachineGames, Legacy of Rust is the newest episode for DOOM, and the first official episode since DOOM II to feature new demons and weapons. This 16-map Episode is broken up into two 8 map sections: The Vulcan Abyss and Counterfeit Eden.

name: Stray Cats in Cozy Town: Night Lights
description: Who knew that Cozy Town had such a great nightlife? It appears that some strays only venture out at night! All proceeds that Devcats and Travellin Cats will receive from this DLC will go to the Humane Society, so you’ll be having fun while making a real difference in the lives of stray cats. Explore the nighttime streets and alleys of Cozy Town to find and help the nocturnal strays!

name: Country Tales 2: New Frontiers - Collector's Edition
description: Join the new sheriff in town, forge strong friendships and explore the Wild West in this fun and dynamic time management strategy game! Enjoy in dozens of unique levels, bonus levels, medals and collectables; build, upgrade, trade, collect, clear the road, explore and much more...

name: Secret Thursday

Every four years, there is a leap year...
And if leap day falls on a Thursday...

Then that day is...

Secret Thursday.

description: A customizable maze experience to stimulate the brains hippocampus region. Great for kids developing or improving concentration & short term memory. Just as good for us older ones to help keep our brains active and sharp. 300 mazes, 4 ways to play each, plus a reverse option = 2400 ways to finish.

name: The Labyrinth

name: The Out Door
description: You wake up in a closed room. To escape, you need to choose the correct door 100 times in a row. Solve the puzzles, attract luck, and clear the challenges. Intelligence, reflexes, accuracy, insight, and gaming skills—everything will be tested.

You have always been interested in stockings and is intrigued by this mysterious place. You decided to visit Apaku for himself, hoping to learn more about it. What will happen there?

Enter this fantasy world and overcome intense challenges, find hidden lore, and discover the true reason behind your imprisonment.

Grim halls, monsters, and rusty mailbox blood await. The four chapters include spooky stories, jump scares, and difficult riddles.

description: Survive waves of WWII enemies with your squad in this 2.5D roguelike. Use support & assault cards to amp firepower. Time's ticking, make your stand!

name: Wizard's Legacy
description: Wizard’s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.

name: Muggo Clicker
description: Introducing Muggo Clicker, the addictive idle clicker game! Muggo, the adorable alien who loves clicks. Each click raises your counter and offers a chance for epic drops. Equip, flaunt, or trade your treasures. Click, collect, and conquer – who knew clicking a Muggo could be this fun? Start now!

name: Colorful Ghost
description: Embark on a puzzling adventure in COLORFUL GHOSTS! Guide ghosts through challenges where candies change their colors, allowing them to blend with others. Overcome obstacles with logic. With ColorAdd accessibility features, easily identify colors. Can you solve these spectral puzzles?

name: Anime Dance-Off: Party Total

name: Drone Pilot: Extreme Flight Simulator

name: Spammerina
description: Ever wanted to just Spam a bunch of Spells? Discover and Enhance your new favourite spells to slay a myriad of monsters! Loot, Explore, and Uncover the Secrets of The Dark Continent! Blast beasts with Blood magic, Divine Judgement, and more! The Dark Continent is waiting...

name: Before Exit: Supermarket
description: Before Exit: Supermarket combines features from roguelike with walking simulator. As Supermarket employee you clean up damaged items, wipe up stains, and turn off the lights. Your task is close the store behind you, hoping that all tasks have been completed.

name: Backrooms: The Labyrinth
description: Explore non-linear paths and evade lurking monsters as you uncover the mysteries of this eerie maze. Beware of the sinister entities that inhabit the shadows, ready to drag you deeper into the unknown.

name: The Legend of Piss Boy 2
description: A retro action platformer! Play as Piss Boy or King Krow and try to defeat the Time Wizard!

name: Holy Heroes
description: Cooperative gameplay for 1 to 4 players on a single computer using keyboards and controllers. Choose from 9 distinct hero classes to explore diverse floors and biomes, battle monsters, and acquire upgrades, equipment, and items.

name: Treasure Protector
description: In this game, you play as a dragon defending your treasure by burning, freezing, poisoning, and shocking knights, archers, and thieves. Combine elemental powers for powerful effects, raise dragons and set traps in this turn-based strategy.

name: Do Not Look at the Moon
description: The moon, once serene, now portends doom. Air raid sirens blare, TVs warn: "Do not look at the moon." Your world's turned upside down. Messages flood in, all asking: How to survive in this world of bizarre rules?

name: Good Soup
description: Welcome to Good Soup, a deliciously terrifying indie horror game where your simple craving for soup takes a sinister turn. Inspired by the popular Itch.io game "Egg Fried Rice," Good Soup blends everyday mundanity with spine-chilling horror, delivering a uniquely unsettling experience that will leave you hungry for more.

name: Dungeons 4: The Good, the Bad and the Evil
description: Dungeons 4 – The Good, the Bad and the Evil awaits the Absolute Evil and his more or less dedicated General Thalya with (train)wagon loads of evil work to do. Led by their fearless queen, Brynnhild, those pesky dwarves have infiltrated a new part of the Overworld, the West, and kidnapped the Council of Little Snots. In this latest adventure, the Only-too-familiar-with-hardships Evil has to face new enemies equipped with pistols, sniper rifles and rotary guns, and … a beer-brewing beast of a dwarf. But of course, the Cunning Evil is prepared and leaves you well-equipped with new traps and building options to protect your stony dungeon heart!

name: Cats Hidden in Magic Places

description: "Reveal all, deceive all." Hornet the Vanguard, a mystery-solving adventure game. Solve mysteries and gather information in the exploration part, and uncover the truth in the deduction part! …The key to the case is always with buddy.

name: DJ Simulator
description: DJ SIMULATOR takes you from "Bedroom DJ" beginnings to festival headlining superstardom! Master REAL DJing techniques, upgrade and buy more gear, learn to read crowds and climb the ranks to fame and success!

name: Mineral
description: A minimalist sci-fi physics based ball-rolling puzzle game. Use abilities and gather collectables to solve puzzles and unlock secrets!

name: Masterpack for Doom II
description:
The 'Master Levels for Doom II' is a grab-bag collection of various unstructured, unorganized WAD files, all made by various map authors with a wide variety of styles and design conventions.

Most of the authors involved in the project, made these maps with the intention of them being a part of larger episode or campaign overarching a certain theme even before being contacted by id Software for this project of theirs.

However, not all maps made by these authors were accepted by id Software, being later released freely by their creators after the fact, with some of them even continuing their work further, beyond the original submitted level sets.

The Masterpack works by taking everything made by the authors past, present and future to the original Master Levels release and bringing it together in a single WAD file for your enjoyment.

All 45 relevant (plus 1 bonus) map are now fully playable as 5 separate, organized episodes. And with this, you can now properly enjoy the works of Doom's early great authors, some of early Doom's most timeless work.

name: Haus of Irndrous
description: Delve into a chilling psychological horror experience, set within the confines of a sinister mansion. Solve intricate puzzles, evade twisted adversaries—partially human animatronics—and unearth the truth behind your father's vanishing act. Brace for escalating challenges at every turn.

name: Terminal Escape
description: No docs. No tutorial. No escape. Inspired by a bad day with a package manager.

name: SteamWorld Heist II
description: Join Captain Leeway and his ragtag crew as they uncover the enigmatic menace threatening the Great Sea. Equip and upgrade your crew for turn-based gunfights packed with ricochet action and engage in real-time naval combat. Get ready to aim, plot, and plunder in this uproarious Steambot adventure!

name: Loopstructor
description: Loopstructor is a strategy tower defense survival Roguelike game. Design defensive lines, assemble battle carts and construct firepower to destroy waves of enemies! Continuously experiment with different combinations of caravans and zones to slaughter the monsters.

name: JDM: Rise of the Scorpion
description: Experience the automotive culture of Japan with a free prologue to Japanese Drift Master. Learn about the story of the rebellious high schooler Hatori and race through the winding roads at Haikama Lake. Discover the places where drift was born!

name: Black Wolfberry: WuJing
description: This is a third-person action shooter where you need to break through a maze

name: Him, The Smile & Bloom
description: Your boyfriend works at a flower shop. As if smiling at a flower, he showers you with love that’s both sweet and sour. These are four love stories connected by flowers.

name: Dungeon Exiles
description: Conquer the darkness in Dungeon Exiles, an autobattler roguelike set in a dark fantasy world. Descend into the procedurally generated dungeon, level up, unlock synergies and acquire powerful items as you fight for survival against the tides of darkness!

description: A young hunter named Cara is chosen by the Goddess of Light to bring the spirits of the land back to normal, getting rid of any corruption they might have in their souls. Along the way she will meet a few friends and allies that might try to help her on her journey.

name: Zombie Police: Christmas Dancing with Police Zombies
description: Rookie human detective and energetic zombie detective, a mismatched buddy tackle mysterious cases! Get to the truth with the zombie's super powers and human deductive skills in this dark-pop mystery ADV!

name: Meowsterpiece Museum
description: Great painters love cats and hid them in their masterpieces. Your mission is to find them and make the paintings even more beautiful.

name: Go To Hell Must
description: Want to decide where mortals go when they die? Welcome to hell! With one click, you can decide whether mortals should go to heaven or stay in hell.

name: Astro Hunters VR
description: Embark on an epic interstellar journey in Astro Hunters VR, the open-world VR action game set in space. Immerse yourself in the exploration of diverse planets, fight with different enemies, craft, gather resources, and upgrade your weapons – either solo or in multiplayer.

name: Astro Hunters VR
description: Become one of the mercenaries called Hunters in this PvPvE Extraction Shooter. Undertake dangerous missions and challenge other players and in exchange freely scavenge the planets. You can join forces with other players, but be careful, hunting down other players to seize their valuable equipment is also an option! Going on an expedition comes with a high reward if you find valuable items, but it’s also high risk-if you die, you lose everything!

name: Nightmare Side: The Game
description: Indonesian horror game set in Ardan Radio station from Bandung. Don't listen to Nightmare Side alone, or you'll invite the darkness.

name: Vinecard
description: A Roguelike game with action card style. Explore divine weapons on the Kochab Star, slay demons and eliminate demons, solve mechanism puzzles, and cultivate to the pinnacle of perfection.

name: Preserve
