name: Mini Settlers
description: Mini Settlers is a minimalistic city builder! Settle islands, construct cities, and design efficient logistic networks to fulfill your buildings' needs and fuel population growth to adventure into new worlds.

name: Ichima-san
description: A stealth action adventure in which you play as a Japanese traditional doll and explore the house without anyone finding you.

name: The Burst
description: The Burst is a smashing high-speed VR shooter. Play as a spec ops operative to bring down the tyrannical warband leader and her goons. Restore order on a prison planet the best way you can - with violence.

name: Cat Quest III
description: In Cat Quest III you play as a purrivateer in a freely explorable 2.5D open-world swarming with Pi-rats. You can sail the seas in your ship for treasures galore! But prepare for peril, as the Pirate King aims to hunt you down...

name: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
description: Battle your way through a seedy tavern filled with gambling addicted townspeople in this Blackjack Roguelike Adventure. From aces and face cards to tarot cards, business cards and more, create your unique deck to beat the house.

name: On the Job
description: Sneak your way past guards and obstacles through as many levels as you can in this turn-based roguelite stealth game, getting top secret documents and super cool gadgets on the way!

name: Sushi Drop
description:
Merge the same sushi blocks to make great sushi!
Can you merge the sushi ordered by the customer and clear the stage?
How expensive & luxury sushi can you make? Try it right now!
Sushi Drop : Merge Puzzle is a simple, classic puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in the family!

name: Wedgie Simulator
description: 1, 2, 3. ATOMIC. WEDGIE. ACTION! Give people wedgies in several different angles and poses. Take screenshots. Animate. Make a video. Upload it online.

name: Kring
description: KRING is an hand-made / random-designed / indie-god-clicker game where you'll need to dominate the most stupid breed of the whole universe: the KRING! Do it through 8 (or 10?) different games, which tell to the universe the story of the loser gods who defeated (maybe) the SuperLegendary Gods!

name: The Ghost and the Golem
description: Confront mystic perils and revelations, pogroms, & your own wild heart, in a Jewish historical fantasy of bandits, betrothals, klezmers, and kabbalists!

name: Depersonalization
description:
Depersonalization is an COC like RPG game. TRPG! Dice! Cthulhu! Bad End! Multi-branch! A different world starting from zero!
The game consists of multiple modules, each of which has multiple endings and branch routes, striving to build a diverse, themed world.

name: Grab
description:
GRAB is a multiplayer parkour game. You climb, slide and run through levels to make it to the end. But don't fall and don't touch the lava!
It's a fun multiplayer experience to try and finish levels first, showing others how it's done or making levels together to share with the community.

The editor allows one or more players to work on a level at the same time, and any player can jump into play mode to test a section at any time.

name: Legends of Venari
description: Legends of Venari is a creature collection RPG that is being built on the Ethereum blockchain network. LoV, in its current state (the Beta Season), is an idle browser-based game where players catch Venari creatures. LoV is an iterative project built alongside the web3 community as features get rolled out over seasons (3-4 Months).

name: Let Me Out
description: Play as Alvin, a 10-year-old indigo child, in search of his mother and escape Mata Koetjhing, an ancient Javanese village. Get help from your little sister’s spirit, your pet spider and brew potions to exorcize mysterious creatures.

name: Deathbound
description: Deathbound is a one-of-a-kind party-based soulslike set in a callous world where Faith and Science clash. The forbidden city of Akratya is an unforgiving land that cannot be conquered alone. Bind with fallen warriors found throughout your crusade and dynamically transform between characters seamlessly in mid-combat with the unique 4-hero party system.

name: Knock on the Coffin Lid
description: Help the main character, that has risen from the kingdom of dead, return home and fulfill his destiny. Unravel the tangle of plot intricacies and the motives of the characters - or let fate lead you.

name: Plague of Athens VR
description: Plague of Athens tells the story of Nikos of Athens, a physician during history’s first recorded pandemic, 429 BCE, who struggles to treat the multitude who fall ill during this world-upending ordeal.

name: Cradle of Nightmares: Chapter 1
description: You play as Faust, an agent of the secret organization Nostra Edemas. Using time-travel technology, your mission is to bring justice to the most heinous killers of the past—both the infamous and those whose crimes remain untold by history. 18+

name: Methods 3: The Invisible Man
description: Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 14
description:
This pack includes:
• Forsaken Magyar Skin
• Magyar Legend Unlock
• Nightmare Mauler Hammer Skin

name: Bee Magic
description: A game about moving around to cast spells.

name: Idle Champions: Avatar of Azuth Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Azuth's Marid Familiar 1 Epic Golden Potion 1 Potion of the Hunter 2 Epic Potions of Speed

name: Idle Champions: Masquerade Ball Rust Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Rust (if you don't already have them) Masquerade Ball Rust Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Rust 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Rust Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: 2048 Advance
description: A homebrew port of 2048 to GBA and Web Browser.

name: I Love Me, I Love Me Not
description: Play this game every time you need to remind yourself that you love who you are.

name: Bad Credit? No Problem!
description: Step into the shoes of a title loan agent for 14 days. Make tough decisions and uncover stories in a world where every choice matters.

name: Marble Hill
description: Marble Hill is a new 20-level episode megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by the various members of Doomer Boards, led by Matador. The theme is loosely based on the aesthetic of the Marble Zone levels from Sonic the Hedgehog. These maps tend towards ancient temples/structures and feature limestone, lava, overgrown vegetation and purple rocks.

name: Fashion Store Simulator
description: Step into the glamorous world of fashion retail with Fashion Store Simulator, the ultimate 3D fashion store management experience! As the owner of a burgeoning fashion boutique, you'll have the opportunity to turn your store into the go-to destination for style-conscious shoppers.

name: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Edition
description: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Edition includes a set of trinkets to hang on your backpack. The bundle also consists of the original soundtrack and artbook.

name: Idle Champions: Lae'zel's Champions of Renown Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Hatsune Miku Bomb Squad!
description:
Everyone knows that Hatsune Miku can do anything.

Virtual pop idol, racing team mascot, snow festival spokeswoman, boxing instructor... you name it, she's an expert. Now a member of the top secret Munitions Intervention Knowledge Unit (M.I.K.U.) she's ready to teach you the finer points of bomb defusal.

Join Miku in solving 25 challenging puzzles while enjoying a bundle of chiptune Hatsune Miku song covers in this puzzle game exclusively for the Game Boy Color!

name: Creatures of Ava: Deluxe Backpack Trinkets Set
description: Get ready for an adventure on the planet Ava with a set of unique backpack trinkets.

name: Creatures of Ava: WDC Charity Backpack Trinkets Set
description: Want to help save wildlife on our planet as well? Buy this DLC to support an organization that helps endangered species. 11 bit studios will donate 81% of Net Receipts from sales of this DLC to WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation. WDC is a UK registered charity (no. 1014705).

name: Prove It and Move It
description: You claim you're a gamer... that you have skill... well why don't you prove it then? Here. Here's more than 300 chances to prove you're the real deal. All you gotta do is not get hit by anything.

name: Derpy's Fun House
description: This is a very short Point and Click Adventure where you try to find Items for Anon because he is the strongest who can help opening the Door to the outside

name: Format
description: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the top scorer in this pixel battle?

name: Sokubaku Kanojo to Pet na Boku: I'm Your Pet
description: Wouldn't anyone be happy to have a girlfriend who makes them lunch and comes to pick them up every morning? If I had to pick one flaw...it would be that this love is very suffocating...

name: Mainichi Danjo Irekawari Seikatsu?! My Body Your Body
description: "My Body Your Body" is a novel game where the protagonist and three heroines find themselves under a curse that swaps their bodies. As they navigate everyday activities like changing clothes and bathing, they search for a way to reverse the situation in this gender-swapping story.

name: Mage's Legacy
description: Mage's Legacy: Explore the World of Magic

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Yokai Club
description: Introducing ”JALECOlle” a project to release a series of Jaleco's Famicom titles!. The second release is "Yokai Club"!

name: Mortal Glory 2: Reign of Tyrants
description: Reign of Tyrants is an expansion pack to Mortal Glory 2. Dominate the tournament with new playable boss characters and discover powerful new items, skills and more!

name: Terra Revive
description: A simulation of rebuilding a planet after it has been almost completely destroyed. Your task is to make the earth fit for human life again. Survive, build and explore!

name: Rodland of Pipes
description: Just who is Rodland? Is he really running a small plumbing business, or is something more sinister afoot? Whatever he's doing, its up to you to crawl down there and get to the bottom of this.

name: Surrounded by Death
description: Lead your people, fight for survival, become their ruler in this 2D strategy game. To accomplish this, you will have to create powerful walls, an efficient economy and a strong army

name: Merge Donut
description: Merge Donut is a delightful clicker game where you click on Donuts! Every 3 and 18 hours, receive a surprise Donut to grow your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?

name: Womb Defense Force
description: Run and gun your way deep into the neo-humanoid territory and save mankind from its own creation! Fight as special ops commander Layla in this mutant blasting weapon rich 2D action sci-fi shooter!

name: Color Dodge
description:
Dive into the colorful world of Color Dodge, the exciting arcade game that challenges your reflexes and reaction speed. Test your skills and quick thinking as you jump your ball through dynamic, color-changing walls.

Are you ready to experience the ultimate color marathon? Then download Color Dodge now and become the master of colors!

name: Raid on Rift
description: Be prepared to defend your Ore in this multiplayer turn-based strategy game! Take control of the Imperial Navy or the dreaded Space Pirates, and use a variety of crewmates to take your opponent's Ore before they take yours!

name: Day of Invasion: Reloaded
description: Day of Invasion: Reloaded is a First Person Zombie-Shooter that takes place within the Horton-Genetics Disaster of Milespring. Find Weapons to fight your way through hordes of Infected!

name: Record Shop Simulator
description: Welcome to Record Shop Simulator! Design and run your dream record store, selling vinyl, gear, and more. Customize everything from decor to inventory, manage your store with care, fend off shoplifters, and tackle dynamic challenges. Can you build the ultimate music haven? Find out now!

name: Grab and Guts
description: Grab and Guts - Shooter about JuraPis' journey through the human body, microscopic world, and unimaginable liquids and corners of light. Use your grappling hook to navigate, gather weapons, and eliminate parasitic enemies.

name: Photo Playhouse
description: This is a 2D pixel action game where the protagonists defeat bosses. Players can switch between four different characters, each with multiple skills, to experience the thrill of combo attacks and the excitement of combat.

name: Obsessed With The Streets
description: A next-gen open world street racing game. Defeat your rivals, earn their cars, customize them, repeat!

name: Run The Words
description: Ever read a book and found your eyes running across the letters and jumping over the spaces? You will after playing Run The Words.

name: My Friend Toby
description: How long will you survive before Toby catches you?

name: Horror Storm
description: Unearth chilling secrets in a town's underground hospital.

name: Dragon Warrior
description: In this game, you're transported into a world of challenging puzzles, set against a tranquil blue backdrop.

name: Alien Weapon Test Grounds
description: The Alien Weapon Test Grounds (AWTG) is an artificial domain where you can test guns created by other civilizations and sharpen your shooting skills.

name: Anomalous Adventure
description: Slay monsters and explore procedural worlds in this old school hack and slash Mini-RPG set in a fantasy world. Battles are a combo of turn based and real time elements. Block enemy attacks and enhance your own using active abilities.

name: Game of Squares
description: Squares is a pattern matching 2D game inspired by the Rubik's cube,. Customise the game's rules to your liking. Challenge yourself by getting faster.

name: The Last Train
description: Your sister has recently gone missing at the nearby metro station. After several more reports of weird occurrences, it is agreed to abandon and close the platform. From hearing the news of losing your sister, every night you have been searching the platform for any clues on her disappearance.

name: Distant Garden
description: An exploration and building game inspired by Minecraft and LSD Dream Simulator.

name: Force of Numbers
description: Live streaming game "Force of Numbers" Live stream Force of Numbers and play with your viewers!*This game is a viewer-participation game for video streamers.

name: Nucleuz Underground
description: The planet is dying, a team has been created that has to go underground, in the exile of the machines and hit the core. Only in this way, humanity will be able to survive and we have the mission to do so every day. A classic 2D platform game, in a dystopian and survival future. Join the team. Now.

name: Kioku Hanabi
description: Remember the color, location, and timing of the fireworks that were launched, and try to launch them in the same way. Although the rules are simple, it is deep and you will be drawn to the beautiful visuals.

name: Snatch & Swallow
description: This is an action rougelike game Players need to strategically select possession objects while also selecting various beneficial gain attributes that benefit them.

name: Daisy Dangerous
description: A 2D puzzle and precision platformer based on the 1989's classic, Rick Dangerous.

name: Life of Kanji Island
description: Life of Kanji Island is a game that helps you understand the ‘meaning’ of Japanese Kanji characters. Survive the island where all elements are composed of Kanji and master the Kanji!

name: Bonoru Adventures
description: Although it is a protected species worldwide, it is a harmful species in its own korea. The story of Bonoru, the water deer. I tried it as a casual former death, a platform game. space jump Arrow keys (wasd) movement Right mouse button special ability

name: Moonless Moon
description: When night falls, she wanders into another world... Moonless Moon is a text-based adventure game following a girl as she travels through a variety of different worlds.

name: 1 to 1 Humanoid Edible Toys
description: A story about Ambiguous Affection, Appetite, and Tantalizing Desires.

name: Shift Legacy Collection
description: Step into the monochromatic and mind-bending universe of the Shift series developed by Antony Lavelle, where black and white landscapes hide more than meets the eye. This collection unites the original four titles - Shift, Shift 2, Shift 3, and Shift 4.

name: Project Apparatus
description: Power generators, stun haywire hostiles and move metal objects using your spark tool in this sci-fi steampunk platformer.

name: Cats Around Us: Giant Cat
description: We've hidden numerous cats in a silent comic about a giant cat causing chaos in a village. Can you find all those cats?

name: ReCoil
description: ReCoil is a 2D Top-Down Shooter with a unique twist to it's genre. The recoil of your weapons launches you back.

name: BouncyBirdy
description: A simple bird game, have fun playing :)

name: Job Joust
description: Dunk and bump your friends in this 4-Players physics party game with wacky characters.

name: Project Bob
description: After a High_tech artificial intelligence robot named "SH" goes wild, you realize that you can't defeat him alone so you start to make a robot, helping you to stop him.

name: Pawn Simulator
description: Pawn Simulator, Prove your trading prowess. Find the most profitable products by bargaining and show off your trading skills. Develop your trading strategies and master your tactics to stay ahead of your competitors. You're no longer just a vendor, you're on your way to becoming the ruler of Detroit's trading world! Make a name for yourself with your achievements in every trade and prove that you are the most successful merchant running a pawn shop.

name: Yaad
description: Immersion game, evolve like a child practicing a game loop without fear of error and judgment.Interaction and immersion tool for learning the English language. Training and task simulations, rich stimuli, and gradual changes close to real-life experiences.

name: Creatures of Ava
description: Let your empathy guide you as you play an exciting action-adventure, creature-saver game. Understand and tame the creatures of Ava and let them lead you through a variety of ecosystems – all in the hopes of saving the planet from a life-consuming infection.

name: Pryzm
description: A survival adventure mystery with turn-based combat and escape parameters that change with every new 1 to 2-hour run. A visual novel that can be played like a speedrun.

name: Fate/Stay Night Remastered
description:
A remastered version of Fate/Stay Night, a fantasy action drama visual novel and TYPE-Moon's first-ever commercial release in 2004. Based on the 2012 release of Réalta Nua, it features a series-first adaptation into languages such as English and Simplified Chinese, as well as graphics and animations rendered in full HD.

Experience in vivid detail the story of Shirou Emiya, a teenage boy with dreams of becoming a Hero of Justice, and his battle revolving around the omnipotent wish-granting vessel, the Holy Grail.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
description:
Jump into the pit and immerse yourself in a new chapter in the Five Nights at Freddy’s universe. Oswald wishes his town, and his life, weren’t so boring. That all changes when he explores the ball pit in a rundown pizzeria and finds himself in the past. However, Oswald’s deepest desire will have an unexpected cost…

Survive five nights of terror in this chilling adventure game. Travel between time periods, gather clues, and outrun the threat relentlessly pursuing you. Move swiftly and stay hidden, and you may just survive. But be careful—it’s not just your own life that’s on the line. Oswald’s father and children from the past could all meet their end if you don’t save them.

name: Laby and the Mysterious Planet
description: Laby and the Mysterious Planet can be played anytime and with anyone! A quiz game where up to 8 players can play together to win. On a mysterious planet where "piece of quiz" are floating, you and your robot buddy "Laby" will try to restore the liveliness of the planet through quizzes!

name: Inner Darkness
description: Inner Darkness is a first-person horror game made in pixelated 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of loneliness. The gameplay consists in walking around locations, solving riddles.

name: Gravitorium
description: Harness the power of gravity to maneuver through challenging precision platforming and puzzle levels in this fun and kinetic 2D platformer!

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble
description: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble is a rhythm game in the world of destruction.

name: Umbral
description: Umbral is a game focused on its own story and narrative, with a first-person view, elements of horror, exploration and puzzles. In Umbral, you take on the role of Mateus, a young adult frustrated with life who, after facing several personal problems, decides to commit suicide. However...

name: Zombie Battlefield Survivors
description: Zombie Battlefield Survivors is a top-down view roguelike action shooter game. Fight against hordes of zombies, constantly upgrading attributes and collecting credits to enhance your character's abilities.

name: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope
description: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope is a thrilling puzzle adventure where action, mystery, and mathematics collide. Navigate the enchanting world of Delearnia, conquer challenges, and defeat enemies with the power of mathematics. Rediscover the fun in being a thinker. Become the Mathemagician!

name: Burning Branch
description: Blaze a trail through a gauntlet of unique and varied bosses, in this rogue-like boss rush about smoldering want.

name: Revue Starlight: El Dorado
description: The first console game of the stage-themed multi-media franchise "Revue Starlight" is on its way!

name: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona
description: Skelethrone is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania, Blasphemous and Dark Souls.

name: Underwater Diving
description: You are an underwater diver surrounded by aggressive fish and mines. Collect the black corals to clean the idols. USP: The diver's energy represents both his life and his stamina, but also his oxygen.

name: I Fetch Rocks
description: Asteroid Hauler simulator designed from the ground up for Room Scale Virtual Reality. Completely customize, maintain and repair the controls and systems of your ship using 100s of interconnecting components that fully simulate power and data distribution.

name: I Want to Go to Mars
description: A fun and exciting point & click story book adventure to Mars for kids and parents. Suitable for the young and the young at heart!

name: Rat Climber
description:
You are a rat. You must climb.
Reach the top, claim the cheese!

In Rat Climber, you only have one goal: reach the top of the world.
You must navigate vertical labyrinths and make daring jumps, but be careful; one false move and you go tumbling down.

Can you guide Ratty to the top of the world and reach cheese heaven? Try your skills in the best 3D ratformer ever made!

name: Trainz 2019: SA AN Class - Australian National
description: The AN Class entered service on Australian National's standard gauge network from Broken Hill to Adelaide, Alice Springs and Perth. In 1995, all were leased to National Rail, and later were transferred to Pacific National where they were used on a wide variety of trains.

name: Boku no Saiai no
description: The story of the timid, quiet, and gentle Sara, and the assertive Yura who loves him. Sara is a medical student, and he depends on Yura in his daily life. Sara finally has some free time to take a break, and he spends it with Sara, but... They both hold dark feelings within them, and wish this time would last forever.

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
description:
Join the Apex Games ready for battle with the PlayStationPlus Play Pack. This collection of content will trick out specific weapons and Legends in special gear.

This pack includes:
-2 character skins (Loba & Wattson)
-2 weapon skins (30-30 Repeater , C.A.R.)
-2 banners (Loba & Wattson)

name: Apex Legends: Shockwave
description: Grab the squad, because the Games have a whole new energy! Drop back into the fight with Revivals, feel your power surge with Akimbo, use two new Battle Sense features to narrow in on your enemies in the heat of the fight, and more updates that make the Outlands legendary for all. Hone your skills in Bot Royale and hit new heights in E-District, your very own neon playground. Customize Stat Trackers to suit your needs or your ships, and you’ll automatically unlock three new ones for logging in this season. Time to Tap in, Legend.

name: Orisries
description:
Orisries is an adult simulation game designed to immerse you into a fantasy world with its captivating plot and distinctive gameplay.
Recruit new heroes, including celestial beings, sect members, or elves; train the heroes and unlock new skills to help you conquer the world.

name: BTS Cooking On
description:
Embark on a culinary journey around the world with TinyTAN, characters by BTS!

Invite friends to get up to a ER Photocard & special profile frame.
The more friends you successfully invite, the more rewards you and your friends will receive.

Spread joy all over the world through the magic of food and fill the world in a vibrant purple happiness.
You, as the chef, are about to go on a journey to learn new skills while making friends all across the world.

name: 80's BASIC Games
description:
These are C64 BASIC games the developer wrote as a teenager in the 1980's. They're slow, glitchy, and barely playable.

BOUNCY BALL
"My first attempt at what could be called a game. Uses joystick in port 2. Try to place blocks in the ball's path to score points."

LOST MAZE
"Text adventure/maze game. Complete."

AMAZING MAZE
"Graphical maze game, player controls animated sprite character. Uses joystick in port 2. Mostly complete."

CHOPPER RAID
"Unfinished horizontally scrolling shooter, similar to Activision's Chopper Attack."

D&D
"Simple dungeon crawler, uses custom characters. Uses joystick in port 2. Load & run "D&D", then follow the prompts. Complete."

DEFLECTION
"Breakout-style game. Uses joystick in port 2. Complete."

PLANET DEFENDER
"Invaders from space are attacking the planet. If they blast a hole in the ground, patch it by moving your ship over the hole. Uses joystick in port 2. Complete."

name: BCBasic
description: Help the caveman reach his beloved by crossing a territory full of dangers. Run on the wheel, jump and duck to avoid obstacles, such as holes, branches, rocks, etc. that will present themselves along the way.

name: Funeral Song for the Elemental Lords
description:
"Though I am bound by chains, my soul is free.
I'm the only one who can save myself."

A free exploration platformer for Web & Windows, by Sylvie & Aria. Fairly difficult and around 3-5 hours long.

name: Legend of the Hunter: House of Dragons
description: In a remote dragon-hunting village, a boy establishes an unlikely friendship with a small dragon, challenging the traditions and prejudices of his community.

name: Isolation Instinct: Farming, Craft, Survival
description: Show your ability to survive! Be a part of a wild world with unlimited borders!

name: Star Wars Jedi Cross-Gen Bundle Edition
description: Get* STAR WARS Jedi Cross-Gen Bundle Edition to outfit Cal with the Obi-Wan Kenobi inspired “Jedi Survival'' Cosmetic Pack!

name: Volgarr the Viking I & II Bundle
description: Become Volgarr the Viking in these two precise, hardcore 2D action-platformers.

name: Frozen Hearts
description:
Sophie has been frozen inside a crystal for two centuries. When the ice thaws, she wakes up in an unfamiliar world. Everything is frozen, including the people of the palace in which she finds herself. When she makes her way to the nearby village, people’s shocked reactions surprise her too - they call her a Hero. Legend says she sacrificed herself two centuries ago to end a terrible war, freezing the leaders of both factions along with the rest of the world.

But is that tale all there is to the story?

What roles did Richard the Ice King and Ivan the Rebel Leader really play in Sophie’s life?

What will they do now that they have escaped their icy prison too?

Can Sophie reverse the permanent winter, or will the world be thrown into a final, destructive conflict that freezes the future forever?

name: Star Cycle
description: Star Cycle is a Limit-removing set of 11 short, punchy maps which take 2-3 minutes each to beat.

name: CasualMuyu
description: Peace comes from nature and regularity Tap the screen to knock the "Muyu" and advance the time while enjoying the neglected daily nature, and you will find peace. Suitable for relieving anxiety and insomnia symptoms.

name: Virtual Dream
description: A simple game scene editor Players can place blocks You can customize the position rotation size You can modify the material on the block Can play local videos You can customize the color of the image Custom Sound Map size unlimited one plowing one harvest

name: Blackwoods
description: Alternate history Cold war FPS. Join the Blackwoods unit and unravel a conspiracy which threatens to end your resistance once and for all.

name: League of Abyss
description: 《League of Abyss》It is a 2D top-down pixel style dungeon Roguelike, where players will play as a hero and defeat terrifying monsters in the abyss, clearing the abyss and saving the world!

name: Grand Piano Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a virtuoso pianist and experience the thrill of playing a grand piano in the comfort of your home. Grand Piano Simulator offers an immersive and realistic simulation experience with stunning visuals, and a variety of features to unleash your musical creativity.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Shanghai
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Shanghai landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Infernal Hordes
description: The most ferocious demonic forces have erupted into Sanctuary. Combat demonic hordes in the new Infernal Hordes feature in both Seasonal and Eternal Realms. Pursue new hellish powers with over 50 new Uniques and Legendaries. Cross paths with Lilith’s followers who warn of Sanctuary’s imminent demise at Mephisto’s hand. Pursue new rewards through the Battle Pass, Season Journey, and a new Seasonal Progression.

name: Violent Horror Stories: Anthology
description: 4 short horror games from different authors and in different genres. Each game is an author's vision on the theme of 'pursuit'.

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid Sunset Bundle
description: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid DLC Bundle includes the main game and DLC.

name: Big City Dreaming
description: An open world visual novel filled with lots of intrigue and stories.

name: VBR Clash
description: VBR Clash is a challenging platformer where you must go through exasperating and sometimes maddening levels that requires skill and precision to complete. The different gamemodes will offers you different platforming experience to bring you one step closer to mastering the art of platforming.

name: Super Beast Activation
description: Type: Science fiction and theology style FPS multiplayer shooting game; Topic: Discovering the Truth of the Universe in the Future of Humanity and Its Impact on the Evolution of Human Bones; Modes: PVE (Gun Shooting Battle and Summoning Flying Shuttle Battle), PVP (Gun Shooting Battle).

name: Fill the Fridge
description: Fill the Fridge is a fun and challenging game that puts your sorting skills to the test as you try to organize the contents of a fridge.

name: The Archer
description: Welcome back, warrior! We're thrilled you've returned to embrace your heritage.

name: Atlas Fallen: Reign of Sand
description: In solo or co-op, experience Reign of Sand, the ultimate version of Atlas Fallen. Ride the sands of a timeless land and defeat legendary monsters in spectacular Action-RPG combat using devastating powers.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Enter the sweet world of Sugar Rush, an action packed top-down roguelike filled with sweets and treats to empower your journey. Test your skills by facing various fruit snacks, defeating them with color instead of damage. Find the best set of treats to survive as long as possible!

name: Skidaddle Skidoodle
description: Skidaddle Skidoodle is a single-player arcade game about a small forest gnome mage who protects the forest from evil creatures with magical spells, restoring harmony and balance to nature.

name: Nerl's Crazy C"rough"t!
description: A falling block merge puzzle game starring the wizard Nail. Drop blocks from above and evolve them... but there are three evolution paths! Each block has a freshness level, and if left unattended, it will turn into trash!?

name: Made in Tower
description: Go up to the 100th floor！

name: Hidden Cats In Fallen Leaves Town
description: Find cute cats in Fallen Leaves Town. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Improbability
description: You are all assigned with investigating the backrooms and containing the anomaly. Be aware. There is a high chance of casualties, psychological damage, trauma, and frightening encounters. The safety of the United States relies on you, but what secrets could these members be hiding?

name: Solar Sweets
description: A multiplayer kitchen-simulator game where you can compete with your friends to find how who is the better chef! Create 10+ different types of pastries including: Waffles, Croissants, Pancakes and more!

name: Pigeon Simulator: Bird Simulator - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pupa
description: • Simple gameplay: just click on the screen for a chance to get new skins. It's easy to learn, but hard to put down!

name: The White Room
description: Locked in the white room and you are slowly losing your mind. Not sure what is real anymore and you must escape.

name: Rebirth! New Lover
description: Song Xuan unexpectedly traveled to ancient times, where he met several emotional partners who sincerely treated him. There are Qing'er,Xiaobai, Gu Qiuhan,Lin Miaoxian and Mingyue Rao. He had so many humorous and sweet love stories with them.

name: Masterchef Cakes Edition 2
description: "Masterchef Cakes Edition 2" is a fun and engaging cooking game that focuses on the process of making cakes from start to finish.

name: Hard Parking
description: How well do you think you can drive a car?

name: The Rocket Man
description: Have you ever thought what it would be like to have a superpower?

name: Animals Merge Quest
description: Animals Merge Quest is a relaxing and engaging puzzle game with simple rules that offers hours of enjoyable gameplay.

name: Naelyeojjiggi
description: Catch monsters, swing your sword, and become stronger. The more you train, the stronger you will be.

name: Space Valkyries
description: Year 2979, the cosmic entity "IT" threatens to destroy Earth. Take command of the Valkyria Zenith Serenity and use all your skills to face this threat alongside your beautiful operators.

name: Poker Tower Defense
description: This is a tower defense game played with playing cards, where defensive cards are used to eliminate attacking cards and receive score rewards.

name: Super MineSweeper
description: In the classic Minesweeper game, there can be unsolvable situations. We introduced a feature to "view the number of mines around each cell in a 3x3 or 5x5 grid" to avoid unsolvable situations. There are fifty progressively challenging levels, each with a global speed leaderboard. Go for it!

name: War of Charge
description: Buy soldiers, assemble troops, and simply command them to fight. Each branch has its own strengths, rationally match your lineup, break through the other side's defense line, defeat all the other soldiers, or go to the other side's base camp. Support multiplayer online.

name: FightingChicken
description: 3D shooting mini-game with easy operation. Save the chicks and eliminate the bats, pay attention to dodge and keep moving.

name: Play With My Balls
description: Play with my Balls - Action-puzzle game about shaking balls, destroying opponents, and perfectly sinking them into holes. Collect coins and eliminate enemy balls to become the king of the ball kingdom across all locations.

name: Helldivers 2: Escalation of Freedom
description: Escalation of Freedom is the first major update for Helldivers 2. Get ready to take on the new "Super-Helldive" CR10 difficulty, deadly new enemies, new mission types and much more.

name: Nuts
description: Nuts is the next Strand Type enviroment with a clicker experience, in which you click things! In Nuts you tap the nut to gain even more nuts! Every 2 and 17 hours, you get dropped some nuts. Each nut is made by the community in discord.

name: Engraven
description: Engraven is a single player sci-fi real time tactics game. Build and customize your regiment of soldiers and fight endless hordes of sorcerers and graven thralls.

name: Exodus: The Rise of Chaos
description: You wake up trapped in your own mind, a mental prison filled with fears and distorted memories. To survive and understand the true nature of a Global Apocalypse, you must first confront the inner demons that haunt you.

name: Chained
description: You are chained to your friends and must climb to the top. One wrong move can decide your friendship.

name: I Raised a Flag
description: The youth you didn't have

name: Retail Company Simulator
description: Run your retail company in this free prologue version of the game. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.

name: Shadow Mansion
description: By playing this product, you will push the limits of fear and go after dark secrets. If you dare, step into this scary adventure and unravel the mansion's dark past!

name: Volgarr the Viking II
description: A hardcore, 2D action-platformer where only precision can keep you from death.

name: Neon Puzzle Ball
description: Neon Puzzle Ball is a fun and challenging 2D action puzzle platformer. Navigate each level unlocking doors and mastering new modifiers and hazards, while striving for quicker completion times.

name: Oh no! I'm about to fall in love!
description: The user takes on the role of the male protagonist Lu Shichuan and embarks on a journey of time and space with a photo. They meet seven beautiful women with completely different personalities and appearances. The final chapter of who you can stay with in the world is up to you to decide.

name: All the Darkest Places
description: Step into Alex, an upcoming college freshman battling depression. Living with his widowed father, Alex prepares to move in with Laura, a friend of his late mother. Guide Alex through university life, navigating personal struggles, forming connections, friendship and support.

name: Darkwell: Assassin's Choice
description: 《DARKWELL:Assassin's Choice》 is a fast-paced, one-hit kill style top-down combat game that uses various methods such as hook, deflect, dash, and skills to end enemies, and finally choose your Assassin's Road in this experience

name: Chronicles Of Sagrea
description: Enter the medieval fantasy world of Sagrea with one of its three characters in this action-adventure game. Explore different locations and face numerous enemies with an intense combo-based combat system to discover the threat that looms over the realms.

name: Eden Genesis
description: Eden Genesis is a platform game focused on fast-paced trials, quick reflexes, and a rich story in a cyberpunk world dominated by neon lights and corporations. Take control of Leah, a young cyborg lady, and overcome challenging trials to liberate her corrupted mind!

name: Zomcats Invasion
description: Zomcats Invasion, completely remade with better graphics, animations and smoother gameplay! Play with up to 10 friends online and fight endless hordes of Zomcats! Choose between a variety of maps, difficulties and weapons. Unlock abilities and find cosmetics that fit your style!

name: SPGP Super Polygon Grand Prix
description: Ultra fast Retro Style Racing.

name: Bit Tower
description: Bit Tower is an exciting Tower Defense game that will immerse you in an epic battle between adventurers and monsters! Hire adventurers, place them in the arena, face countless waves, and secure your spot on the leaderboard.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Speed Freeks
description:
Blaze into the high-Orktane mayhem of clashing Speedmobs, in adrenaline-fueled combat racing through the brutal Warhammer 40,000 universe! Drive scrappy vehicles loaded with bombastic weapons and powerful abilities to krump the opposing team!

Assemble your mob of dakka-spitting wagons, pushing their team to victory across multiple maps in this explosively unique take on the combat racing and shooter genres. Obliterate your Ork foes with kunnin’ strategies and brute force as your team speeds towards ultimate glory.

Are you looking for more speed and more dakka in your life? Look no further YA GITS!

name: Candlelight: Lament
description: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

name: On Point
description: Experience classic 90’s arcade vibes with On Point, a fully immersive light-gun shooter for VR. You'll have to think fast and shoot faster as you blast your way through over 30 wacky minigames designed for all ages and skill levels.

name: Haunted: Attack of the Dead Men
description: Inspired by the most epic and little known battle of the Great War, Haunted: Attack of the Dead Men puts you in the middle of a chaotic fight for your life against hundreds of resurrected Russians. Put your arsenal of 8 weapons to good use through 14 levels as you rid the world of this nightmare...

name: Aero GPX
description: Aero GPX is an anti-gravity racer focused on high velocity, flight, machine-to-machine combat, and responsive controls that are easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fight for the best position possible with high speeds, risky maneuvers, and visceral attacks!

name: Earth: Revival
description:
The post-apocalyptic sci-fi survival RPG game Earth:Revival is set in an alien-invaded world and centers around the core experience of open-world survival. It has undergone significant industry innovation and upgrades.
Experience groundbreaking advancements with its "visual revolution", leading-edge "Effortless Play and Fair Spending Reform," a collaboratively crafted sci-fi narrative, and a unique exosuit combat system. Dive into the distinct "Artificial Island" building and social mechanics...

name: MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga
description: Become the deciding factor between fate and ruin. MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga is a narrative-driven RPG where choices impact character, combat and consequence. In a world of celestial magic and violence-devoted talking animals, the only reality may be to perish or persevere.

name: One Btn Bosses
description: It's One Button Bosses, it's all in the name. You have one button. There are big bosses to beat. Push, tap, and bash in the handcrafted campaign or in the roguelike rifts.

name: Morbid Inhale
description: Hungry zombies want to devour you. Take the biggest gun and fight them back! Get experience, upgrade skills, use perks, bonuses, and kill them by any means. Shoot, blast, burn, rip and tear!

name: Cygni: All Guns Blazing
description:
It's a twin-stick vertical scrolling Shooter hybrid with a cinematic flare:

An unrelenting onslaught of eye-popping visuals, ear bursting soundscapes and mind-melting action makes Cygni the vanguard for the next generation of shoot-em ups.

name: Canadian Robot Racing League
description: A survival platforming challenge! CRRL is a 4 player local party game to see who can survive the longest in wide range of quick paced, frantic and deadly levels.

name: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons
description: Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons redefines sports gaming with its groundbreaking first-person volleyball experience. Offering realism and immersion, it brings every aspect of real-life volleyball to your screen with unmatched precision. From powerful spikes to insane digs, it mirrors every court move.

name: Terrors Of North: Finnish Cabin
description: You think you're in luck for getting a cabin for such a good price but you will soon find out why the previous owner wanted to get rid of it. Will you survive the Finnish Cabin experience?

name: Jataí: The Bee
description: The Jataí is a native bee of the Atlantic Forest. It must fulfill its duty to pollinate flowers and collect pollen and nectar to feed the hive. During the mission, some enemies will appear: spiders hanging from their webs, lemon bees raiding the hive, and a large spider, the Queen, who must be stopped.

name: Secret Puzzle Society
description: Help your friend Brooke in a mysterious investigation as she tries to expose the Secret Puzzle Society behind the masks. Beat puzzles, master mini-games, and conquer match-3 levels to uncover clues.

name: Phantom City
description:
Text-based roguelike RPG set in a cyberpunk-themed city.
It's 2087. Despite the concern of many people,
AI still serves humans as its masters.
But... They don't serve all humans equally.

name: The Noise's Jam-Packed Radical Mini Mayhem!
description: The Noise, being the annoying gremlin he is, decided to shrink himself down and go for a "jog" in Peppibot Factory.

name: Midnight Fury
description: Experience a TV show featuring Max Cobra and his teammates as they clean up zombies in quarantine zones. Impress sponsors and boost your fame.

name: Coagulation Station
description:
COAGULATION STATION is a short atmospheric horror game that blends cosmic horror with dark absurdist humor. Maintain a malfunctioning blood rig located deep within the universe's only 'Living Planet' and experience the horrors that lurk within.

In an attempt to pay off your debt to the Grand Galactic Bank, you stumble upon an opening for a job on Carrion Prime, a living world that is famous for it's blood based foods. Your job is to look after one of the various blood rigs that supply the surface with 'Product'. But beware, the pipes tend to suck up all manner of things in addition to blood. Worryingly, there is a rumor going around about the existence of "something big" lurking within the throbbing depths below...

Will you survive to pay off your debt or become another "workplace accident" for the company to downplay?

name: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 2
description:
The Legend of Dark Witch 2 for Nintendo Switch retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist.

Created by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM in 2014, The Legend of Dark Witch 2 is a 2D action story sequel to "The Legend of Dark Witch". True to its predecessor, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist.

Players have 8 stages to choose from and must use SHOTs to make their way through a variety of obstacles to reach the boss enemy. Within each

New to the Remake:
- New Stages
- Returning characters from the Prequel
- Refreshed Artwork
& more!

name: Hentai World: Ultra Extended
description: Sin descripción

name: The Super Robot Bros
description: Learn about this inspiring story of hope and the power of effort to revive a lost world. Join ECHO on their journey to discover if the Earth can be saved and if humanity can return home.

name: The Ripper Wash
description:
You are Mia, a woman who recently moved to another city. You worked in a restaurant as a waitress, but since the place was far away you decided to change it to one of serving people and calls in a laundromat on the night shift.

Time goes by and the atmosphere becomes more tense, you read a newspaper about the 1993 murderer, "The Ripper Wash", who is thirsty for the blood of a new victim. It also says that in one door of your premises there are all the things about him and his murders...

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 02
description: The second installment of a speedmapping event taking place in Clippy's discord server. The wonderful recolours by @Jimmy² from his Zoon-tech subset of Zoon-tex were used and some things were painted by mappers to fit resulting in 12 total maps.

name: A Little to the Left: Extra Tidy Bundle
description: Enjoy the cozy puzzle game A Little to the Left with everything in one place! This bundle includes the A Little to the Left base game with two premium DLC packs, Cupboards & Drawers and Seeing Stars.

name: Sunset Arena
description: Take on Friends in a Synthwave inspired arena where the only control you need is a joystick. Every controller can support 2 players. Play against a friend with a single controller! Supports up to 8 players. Customize, Powerup, and Derezz your way to victory!

name: Blood Sea
description: In this game, you transform into a blue-black bat engaged in a heart-pounding escape from an ancient brown castle.

name: Domain Owner
description: This game takes you into a pure strategy arena, with simple yet elegant graphics.

name: Play And Pray
description: Play And Pray is a clicker game where you can open as many loot boxes as you want. As you collect more items in your inventory, you'll unlock various achievements.

name: Cursed House 4
description: A very unusual Match 3 Puzzle game with some unique features!

name: Highrise City: Vacation Season
description: Vacation Season expands on the strengths of Highrise City and adds a new group of citizens to the mix. A group which needs to be satisfied as well: Demanding tourists.

name: Zebulon: A Lost Cat
description: Zebulon the cat is lost in a strange place, but he has a lot of courage and curiosity quickly replaces fear as he explores and unravels the world around him. It also helps that smelly green food is everywhere to grab!

name: Yin-Yang Ping-Pong: Supporter Pack
description: A supporters pack for Yin-Yang Ping-Pong. Adds the ability to randomize the colors.

name: The Best Duck Clicker
description: A small clicker game about destroying ducks! Collect 25+ ducks, upgrade all your stats, and repeat!

name: Waifu Quest 2
description: A new line of 1000 limited edition figures available for 1 month only. Claim up to 8 waifus every 24 hours.

name: Treasure Hunter: Idle RPG
description: Let your team kill the bad guys and gather all sorts of loot for you to play with

name: The Villainess Is Adored by the Prince of the Neighbor Kingdom
description:
With her engagement annulled, Tiararose was supposed to have been exiled from the country.

"This is the otome game I played!" She realized on the day before the story's ending. Is waiting for my conviction the only thing I can do? But I did not do anything too cruel... Thinking so, the ending proceeds. However, during the judgement, something that was not possible in the game happened. Tiararose was proposed to by the crown prince of the neighboring country.

name: Arkhaanis One
description: In this mechanically challenging 2D hack and slash game, survive through waves of enemies in an ever increasing difficulty, having the satisfaction of feeling your improvement as you learn the enemies and adopt new strategies to deal with them.

name: Aesthetic Clicker
description: Aesthetic Clicker is not your average clicker game! Click the sun to get collectable items from time to time.

name: Yin-Yang Ping-Pong
description: Something to look at.

name: Barrok
description: An arcade racing game in which you try to be first by beating other competitors.

name: Ninja Monkey
description: Battle waves of bees, choose upgrades each round, and defeat challenging bosses. Unlock new classes, maps, weapons, and abilities while refining your build and mastering platforming skills!

name: Elementyle
description: Elementyle is a chess-like, turn-based strategy game where players claim tiles with unique pieces and element sets.

name: Backspace Backspace Backspace
description: In an AI-powered age where original authors have become largely redundant, play as a dejected writer on the brink of losing their creative drive forever.

name: Retro Ball
description: Enter the world of Retro Ball, a whimsical blend of past nostalgia and futuristic fun!

name: Star System Battle
description: Traverse a vast and mysterious universe, where every corner holds potential dangers and unforeseen challenges.

name: The Playful Triangle
description: Each encounter with these "angry squares" pushes you to use your intellect and strategic thinking to evade danger and stay one step ahead.

name: Darok
description: Darok is a simple 2d platformer where you have to navigate Darok back home. There are breakable floors, moving platforms and Geysers to help Darok on his journey home.

name: Frog
description: Frog is a clicker Game, in which you click a Frog! In Frog you click the Frog to gain even more Frogs! Every 2 hours, you get dropped a new Frog. Frogs is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: The Man in the Fields
description: The Man in the Fields is a first person horror game based on a ritual of the same name. Once you summon The Man in the Fields, every door and item in your house will be opened. Close everything in time to prevent it from getting in.

name: Dokoda
description: DOKODA is a hidden-object puzzle game set in 18th-century Japan. Players assume the role of Komaru, a recent recruit at the Museum of World Civilizations. Komaru's mission is to venture back in time to Edo Period Japan and retrieve a variety of artifacts to give mankind a new hope for the future.

name: Into the Wild
description: Into the Wild is a tense yet tranquil survival game where nature holds nothing back. Inspired by the Norwegian hinterlands, the haunting valley of Jegersdal offers a faithful survival experience. Witness the magnificent aurora and search for answers amid the ruins of yesterday.

name: Silent Frontiers
description: A Gripping 2D Side-Scrolling Strategy Tower Defense Extravaganza. In this forgotten frontier, you become the final line of defense for your city, warding off relentless hordes of monstrous invaders. This is not just a battle for survival; it's a supreme test of wit and strategy.

name: Hyper Drive Runner
description: You are a Hyper Drive Runner. You will guide your ship as far as you can while avoiding the many obstacles in the cosmos. The further you go, the higher the score you will achieve and the higher on the leader board you will place.

name: The Evil Sect
description: Take on the role of Phillip in this light action/horror FPS. They kidnapped your daughter, SAVE HER. Aim, shoot, run, jump, defend yourself. Do everything you can to stay alive, explore the area and complete the objective.

name: Polygon Hell 4D
description: You've been trapped in a Non-Euclidean reality, and the only way out is to go on a brutal massacre. Gear up, and get ready to lose your sanity in this disorienting action-packed shooter!

name: Strange Ocean
description: Take your ship into the air as you dodge everything from deadly pirates to dancing dolphins!

name: Inescaped
description: Inescaped is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. What starts as a seemingly innocent game show quickly turns into a fight for survival as you find yourselves trapped within a labyrinthine structure pursued by monsters.

name: Infinity Boob Clicker
description: Endlessly click on what you always wanted to! Progress and improve your tools and conquer them all!

name: USG
description: 'USG' Is a captivating vertical shoot 'em up featuring hand-drawn animations and a unique art style. Customize your run with multiple weapon upgrades

name: Pixel Art Academy: Learn Mode
description: Pixel Art Academy is an educational game for learning how to draw. Learn Mode is a standalone version that focuses on the interactive tutorials, drawing challenges, and projects where you make your own art for video games.

name: Super Shape Cascade
description: You have few seconds to put each shape in the correct place.

name: Etaine: Magic Survivor
description: Etaine: Magic Survivor is a top-down arena shooter survival roguelite game. You can eliminate thousands of enemies through magic or artifacts. You can also choose talents to shape different builds to strengthen yourself. Will you be able to survive when you against the thousands of monsters？

name: Heaven's Paws
description: Do all dogs go to Heaven? You have to figure it out! Get through this emotionally adventurous story about a boy and his little friend, Max.

name: Paper Flights
description: Fly your paper plane down a tower while avoiding obstacles and collecting coins and power ups. How far can you get?

name: Fields of Mistria
description: Start your new life! Build the farm of your dreams as you discover a world brimming with possibilities. Magic, romance, and adventure all await you in this nostalgic farming / life sim RPG!

name: Be Yourself
description: be yourself is a compilation of 5 little games, inspired by Deimos' Endless Pursuit of Becoming Deimos: Part One, from deimos, and Kylie Minogue: Breathe (1998).mp3, from GURN GROUP.

name: Blight
description: Blight is a short exploration game with environmental storytelling.

name: The Devil Within
description: A Sonic.EXE re-take by Brigandistian.

name: Population Quiz
description: Welcome to Population Quiz, the ultimate test of your global knowledge! Do you have what it takes to guess which country or region has a larger population? Put your skills to the test in this fun and educational game that will challenge your understanding of the world's demographics.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Gamer Girl
description: Solve the puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a naughty gamer girl in front of her gaming computer, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Z Juice
description: Z Juice is the only thing that can save you from infection!

name: Master of Shotgun Camper
description: Hey Corner Campers! "Master of Shotgun Camper" is designed for you to perfect the art of corner camping and pre-aiming.

name: Innsmouth Nightmare
description: Professor Daniel Castane grapples with the terrifying mysteries of a cult-dominated island. Accompany him on a journey where he encounters strange characters and faces unsettling visions. Uncover the truth and survive the island's dark secrets, all while battling to retain sanity.

name: Super Dapper Man vs. Furries
description: The Furries must go! Do u really need to know more? Most games have double jump, this one has QUINTUPLE JUMP! Use it to defeat the furries and get "killer combos" that say a funny furry diss and improve your stats until hit. Also there is like, slow motion n' stuff. WISHLIST NOW!

name: Deliberate
description: In this game, you're transported into a mystical forest brimming with the whimsical charm of cartoonish pixel art.

name: Asylum Revenge
description: "Asylum Revenge is an action and horror game set in an asylum. Players will follow Jessie Frost on her quest for revenge."

name: Big Pig
description: Collect all the food and don't get killed by the pigs that are chasing you !

name: Defensive Attacks
description: Place your defenses and protect your base against incoming enemies.

name: August Ends
description: August Ends is a short story RPG Maker game with supernatural elements that centres around cooking. It takes place over the span of a week in late summer and follows the monotonous daily routine of a woman living alone in the woods, isolated save for her trips to an abandoned shrine deep among the trees.

name: Bowser's Fury Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Robot vs Monsters
description: Robot vs Monsters pits you against relentless waves of foes as you control a powerful robot in a top-down world.

name: Strawberry Park
description: A recent disappearance at Strawberry Park, where no one knows what happened, may have a connection to urban legend. Your name is Ruby, and you go to Strawberry Park to investigate at night...

name: A Smoker's Story
description: A short immersive VR experience.

name: Sunrise Down
description: A collection of unique and engaging puzzles. Guided by your host, Antisthenes, you'll not only solve puzzles but also delve into intriguing philosophical discussions.

name: Popcorn!
description: A satisfying clicker where you pop and eat popcorn, discovering secrets along the way! Compete for high scores in time trial mode, or just pop and chill in classic mode.

name: Homeless
description: Beneath the dazzling lights of New York, a sinister darkness lurks. In the hour when the whole city is sleeping, a strange and terrifying man emerges from the darkness, intent on shattering your mind and spirit

name: Wolf Hero: Animals vs. Robots
description: Build a strong pack and protect the forest from evil robots!

name: Secret Number Simulator
description: The numbers?! What do they mean? Can you find them all? Simulate the experience of searching for secret numbers by playing Secret Number Simulator today!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R : Hunter Scope - Legacy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Secrets: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hole io: Godlike Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Spreader
description: Learn to master the art of spreading and compete for the best times in the online leaderboard to prove you are the master spreader in this groundbreaking, never-before-seen spreading experience. Develop new strategies and execute them perfectly to have a chance for a top spot.

name: TacticsLand
description: Adopting the traditional SRPG method, it is a classic tactical game that you have tried in the past. We brought the fun back. Your strategic play becomes the starting point for victory.

name: Abab
description: This game is too simple "AB Button" Puzzle Game to be not lost!

name: Himegashima Island
description: Kokomi is sent to the island of Himegashima, where his cousin demands that he spend his summer making happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience.

name: LoveAndComplex
description: LoveAndComplex is a simulation game set in college. Like any other simulation game, you can watch all sorts of endings by your choice.

name: Bot Shot
description: Blast Everything!

name: Koppun-50
description: Run, jump, dash, and shoot your way through the planet of Koppun-50, stealing your enemies' weapons to survive! Think you have what it takes to defeat 49 other players in this fast-paced battle-royale?

name: Lust Galaxy
description: Immerse yourself in the cosmic passions of Lust Galaxy, an adult visual novel that opens the doors to a world of intrigue and danger.

name: Head Collector VR
description: Head Collector VR is a thrilling action game where spells are full of power, and stunning characters feel alive. You can customize everything to suit your style, even bringing in your favorite characters using XNALara and Vroid models, making each battle totally unique.

name: Farming Tractor Simulator 2024: Drive Combine & Trucks - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Total Extreme Wrestling IX
description: The 9th game of the wrestling booking sim franchise.

name: Lost in the Mine
description: Joe has been trapped deep in the mine after an earthquake. Help him navigate the dark tunnels of the mine and face its dangers until he finds the exit.

name: Assassin's Alliance
description: It is an immersive storyline puzzle game designed specifically for players who love rich storylines.

name: Chaser of Light
description: It is a pixelated agile game presented in fresh light tones.

name: Pack Everything You Can
description: Go through puzzles that bug your brain to collect all the necessary products, making you understand why no one is working there. There will be old rooms with fragile floors, metal detectors to prevent you from reaching some places, locked doors, and many other challenges. Are you ready?

name: Tunshi Unifying Plains
description: "The Conquest of China" is a RPG role-playing game centered around Liu Bei of the Shu Kingdom. Unlike other Three Kingdoms RPGs, the game does not start with the usual storyline, but instead begins with the murder of Liu's mother by the Yellow Turban Rebellion, setting Liu on a path of revenge.

name: Demon of the Dark
description: A 3D Survival Horror Game, in which the player has to investigate an abandoned hospital, while looking out for whatever danger that resides in the unknown darkness. Play Demon Of The Dark for a bone-chilling experience, like none other!

name: AtmaSphere 2
description: Embark on a frosty medieval journey! Guide your ball through snowy platforms, conquer obstacles, hidden challenges, and collect pickups. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, brace yourself for a chilling adventure! Roll to victory in this winter realm!

name: Unrooted
description: Unrooted is a vibrant and eye-catching precision platformer with lush environments and a stunning musical score. Take up your courage and squash your fear of heights. Travel upwards to lands no sapling has dared to explore before. But heed with caution, the higher you journey, the more you risk.

name: No Return
description: No Return is a first-person psychological horror game set in modern-day China. With a focus on family tragedy, the story unfolds as our protagonist is mysteriously prevented from returning home by an unseen force. Can he navigate a nightmarish maze of hallways and uncover the disturbing truth?

name: Nusantara: Bermuda Triangle
description: A fantasy adventure, mystery, drama & romance otome visual novel (GxB) with strong Indonesian flavour. (Not a sequel!)

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultra Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotel Hustle: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Forsaken
description: Forsaken is a 10-level minimod reimagining the "Lost Episodes" for Spear of Destiny, celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2024. Imagine if the original creators of Return to Danger had gone all out, transforming the EXE, palette, music, and sounds into a fully immersive experience. Now you can find out! Along with this free update to owners of Mortuary Assistant on PC and Nintendo Switch, the Definitive Edition is also going to be available on consoles! The Mortuary Assistant: Definitive Edition comes to PlayStation and Xbox on the same date with some new content too!
- Embalming only mode - embalm unlimited bodies

Then choose one of the over 100 patterns and customize the pattern's color, size, rotation, embossing, glow, and metallic properties. name: Cilla
description:
Cilla is a dynamic 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses players into the complex narrative of humanity's evolution and the endless struggle for survival at any cost.

You will acquaint themselves with Cilla - a mysterious entity thrust into the heart of war. She is the Perfect Soldier. Devoid of pain, fear, and remorse. Her journey intertwines with the harsh present and what seems to be an inevitable future, as endless losses and extraterrestrial threats pursue her at every turn. But what will happen when Cilla faces her most challenging trial - a choice that will change everything?

Game Features:

Narrative Twist: Immerse yourself in the story of the Perfect Soldier in an alternate future universe. Experience her emotions and confront a moral choice that will impact Cilla's fate and that of all humanity.

Beautiful Pixel Graphics: Enjoy handcrafted game landscapes, meticulously designed multi-layered backgrounds, and unique enemies in each level.

Challenging and Dynamic Combat: Demonstrate maximum agility, collect bonuses, evade enemy fire, and study their behavior and attacks throughout the gripping story of the game.

Take up the challenge and determine the fate of the world!
